article_title: UnitedHealth Group To Pay Bundled Fee For Cancer Care

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Moving further away from fee-for-service medicine, UnitedHealth Group (UNH), the nation’s largest health insurer, said it will pay the University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center a “bundled payment” for head and neck cancer care. The insurance giant and the cancer center say the pilot program, which will last initially for three [...]
